FuncDef:
The mld snooping static-group group-address vlan command configures static member interfaces for a multicast group in a VLAN.
The undo mld snooping static-group group-address vlan command cancels the configuration. The mld snooping static-group group-address vlan command configures static member interfaces for a multicast group in a VLAN. The undo mld snooping static-group group-address vlan command cancels the configuration. By default, no static member interfaces are configured for a multicast group. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: mld snooping static-group [ source-address <source-address> ] group-address <group-address> vlan { <vlan-id1> [ to <vlan-id2> ] } &<1-10>
undo mld snooping static-group [ source-address <source-address> ] group-address { all | <group-address> } vlan { all | { <vlan-id1> [ to <vlan-id2> ] } &<1-10> }
ParentView: Layer 2 100GE interface view,Layer 2 10GE interface view,Layer 2 200GE interface view,25GE-L2 view,400GE-L2 view,Layer 2 50GE interface view,Layer 2 Eth-Trunk interface view,Layer 2 GE interface view,Interface group view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a multicast source address.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Specifies a multicast group address.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X. The value range is FF00::-FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF. Addresses starting with FFX1 and FFX2 are reserved group addresses and cannot be used.

Specifies a VLAN ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

Specifies a VLAN ID. The value of vlan-id2 must be greater than that of vlan-id1.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

Indicates all of multicast group addresses.
-

Examples: [~HUAWEI-100GE1/0/1] mld snooping static-group group-address ff33::1 vlan 2
ExtraInfo: If hosts need to regularly receive the data of a multicast group (including source-specific group) on an interface, run the mld snooping static-group command to configure the interface as a static member interface of the multicast group.
